name: The Solar Flare Prototype Collection
description:
The Solar Flare Protype Collection Features:

Art Thief: A Top Down Stealth, Gadget-Focused, Heist Experience.

Briefcase: A Hardware-focused, Mystery Puzzle Game.

Crawl of Rock: A Rhythm Dungeon Crawler controlled by a Midi Keyboard.

Creepers: A Top Down, Procedurally Generated Horror Shooter.

Get-Jacked: A Fitness, 3D Clicker Experience!

Metakai: A Top-Down, Rogue-like Inspired,  Shoot em Up.

Mighty Boot: A Frivolous, First-Person Boot-em-Up!

Scorch Duck: A Mobile, Auto-Runner, Platformer.

All Credits are listed in the Collection

Published by: Solar Flare London
